name: Seek Magician
storyline:
Pax goes on a journey to seek magicians and learn wizardry from them in order to become the best magician! 
 
On his journey he must face skeletons, land fish, dread minions, mystery birds, grimy caves, treasure critters, japes, real plastic dinos, mystic squids and many other things.
summary:
Pax goes on a journey to seek magicians and learn wizardry from them in order to become the best magician! 
 
A short RPG inspired by Space Funeral.
